import React from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { useGlobalContext } from "../helpers/hooks/useGlobalContext"; import "helpers/format/currency"; export default function ShoppingCart() { const { state, dispatch } = useGlobalContext(); return (

Shopping Cart

Photo
Product
Price
Action
{Object.keys(state.cart).length === 0 ? (

Ooops... Cart is empty{" "} Shop Now

) : ( Object.keys(state.cart).map((key) => { const item = state.cart[key]; return (
{item.title}
{item.category.title}
{item.price.currency()}
{item.price.currency()}
); }) )}
); }
